data.title: Ep10 : Last Action Heroic chat by Movies Across The Pod
data.meta_description:
Ep10 : Last Action Hero A double-digit milestone! 10 episodes in and we watch the Arnold Schwarzenegger action comedy... Last Action Hero.
We chat about the iconic one-liners, cameos, movies it referenced and more. Apologies for the awful impressions we doðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. Rate and review wherever you listen. #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #lastactionhero #arnoldschwarzenegger #movieschat #podcasts
data.text:
Ep 32 : Some Like It Hot Across The Pod.

We discuss 1959's Some Like It Hot...starring Marilyn Monroe, Tony Curtis and Jack Lemmon.

As one of Frank's fave comedies...it had to be watched.

Find out our opinions of it as we chat about some of the scenes, characters and of course...pitch the next movie.

#moviesacrossthepod #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #movieschat #movies #podcasts #somelikeithot #marilynmonroe #tonycurtis #jacklemmon

Ep 31 : Police Academy Anniversary

We chat about 1984's Police Academy.

How could we not when it's 40 years old?

We discuss the movies characters, some funny scenes and lines, why it could not be made today and much more.

Some fun facts and the next movie is picked...and an audio treat at the end.

Please rate and review.

#moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviesacrossthepod #policeacademy #80smovies #movieschat

Ep 30 : "Better Off" Across The Pod

For our 30th episode we discuss 1985's Better Off Dead starring John Cusack.

We invited Liz McEwan to join us as our first guest.

We chat about some of the characters plot, connections to other movies and even offer some attempts at foreign phrases!

Plus some fun facts, our ratings and of course....what we'll discuss next.

Do tip your paperboy/girl...if you have one!!

#betteroffdead1985 #johncusack #movieschat #80smovies #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviescrossthepod #movies

Ep 24 : Don't Panic In this episode 2005's Hitchhiker's Guide to The Galaxy was pitched. This is one quirky sci-fi comedy with unusual characters and plot. Some trivia along the way plus a Ghostbusters reference. We mention merch and the chance of getting some tea made. Do rate and review wherever you listen. #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviesacrossthepod #movieschat #movies #podcasting #podcasts #hitchhikersguidetothegalaxy

Ep 27 : Hard to Kill this chat!

In this episode we watched 1990's action flick...

Hard to Kill starring Steven Seagal, William Sadler and Kelly LeBrock.

Find out our opinions, usual trivia along the way and of course...the next movie is pitched.

We'll always love watching movies...."and you can take that to the bank!""

#moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviesacrossthepod #movieschat #movies #stevenseagal #hardtokill1990 #actionmovies

Ep 25 : Pieces of April.

We discuss 2003's Thanksgiving-based Pieces of April. Starring Katie Holmes, Oliver Platt, Sean Hayes, Patricia Clarkson and Alison Pill amoung others.

We go through some of the movie's themes, characters and why a dirty sink is not a good thing!

Do rate and review wherever you listen.

#moviesacrossthepod #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #piecesofapril #movies #movieschat #thanksgiving

We take a look at this Audrey Hepburn-Alan Arkin thriller - with intriguing results! Hepburn is 'Suzy Hendrix,' recently blinded in an accident, now alone in her Greenwich Village basement apartment, and fending off three thugs led by Alan Arkin. Based on the stage play by Frederick Knott, it's a classic for the ages that got Hepburn her 5th Academy Award nomination! Plus, our behind-the-scenes fun facts before Dave announces the film for next episode!

Ep 22 : Chronicle

We discuss 2012's Chronicle.

Another found-footage movie that puts a new spin on the superhero genre.

Find out what we think of this cool movie, it's characters, plot and more.

Plus the usual behind the scenes facts and the next movie choice is given at the end of the episode.

#moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviesacrossthepod #movieschat #podcasts # podcasting #chroniclemovie2012

Ep 21 Devil's Advocate

We watched 1997's Devil's Advocate starring Keanu Reeves, Al Pacino and Charlize Theron.

We discuss it's characters and plot...and why it reminded Dave of Ghostbusters 2!!

Plus some trivia and fun facts.

Stay tuned to the end for the next movie pitch.

#moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviesacrossthepod #movieschat #movies #devilsadvocate1997 #keanureeves #alpacino #charlizetheron

Ep 20 : Dredd-ful chat Across The Pod

The movie this time was 2012's comic book adaptation... Dredd.

This action sci-fi movie, starring Karl Urban as the iconic Judge Dredd of 2000AD was new to Frank.

We discuss some of it's key scenes, characters, different perspectives on it's themes and of course....the Sylvester Stallone movie!!

As always...some fun facts thrown in and Frank pitches the next episodes movie choice.

Are you a fan of Dredd?

Let us know on the socials.

Speak to you soon...across the pod! Frank and Dave

#moviesacrossthepod #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #dredd2012 #judgedredd #2000ad #karlurban #comicbookmovies

For this episode, we watched the cinematic milestone that was The Graduate, starring Anne Bancroft as 'Mrs. Robinson,' Dustin Hoffman as 'Benjamin Braddock,' Katharine Ross as 'Elaine Robinson,' and a host of Simon and Garfunkel classics like "Sounds of Silence," "Scarborough Fair," "The Big Bright Green Pleasure Machine," and, of course, the iconic "Mrs. Robinson." Find out what he and Frank have to say about the film and the characters! And they leave you with one word. You listening? "Plastics."

Ep 18 A "Sin"ful chat Across The Pod We watched 2005's graphic novel adaptation... Sin City. A film-noir-style series of stories featuring a great cast of actors. This movies has sensitive content some listeners may not like. They discuss it's characters, actors, some scenes and their content with a few laughs along the way. Plus the usual rating and some fun facts. Get involved via the socials Facebook @Movies AcrossThePod, Twitter @acrosspod2022 and Instagram @acrossthepod2022

Ep 17 : 2013's Gravity For this spoiler-filled episode, we watched Alfonso Cuaron-directed drama Gravity, starring Sandra Bullock and George Clooney. They talk about its success at the Oscars, the impact of the musical score, the characters and actors, and different interpretations of the final moments of the surprisingly shorter-than-expected 91-minute film. After they trade behind-the-scenes fun facts, Dave reveals what Frank will watch for the next episode! Follow us on Twitter at @acrosspod2022 and Instagram at acrossthepod2022 or email acrossthepod2022@gmail.com! Music courtesy of audionautix.com and josephmcdade.com #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviesacrossthepod #podcasts #podcasting #movieschat #space #NASA #gravitymovie #sandrabullock #georgeclooney #spotifyforpodcasters

Ep 15 : Chat across The Grid : Tron 1982 We watch the cult classic sci-fi movie...Tron. As one of his faves...Dave was glad to pitch it. We discuss some of the characters, visuals and why it's nostalgic. Episode 16 will be about it's 2010 sequel...Tron Legacy....coming very soon #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #tron #tronlegacy #disney #movies #podcasts

Ep 14 : 10 Things I Hate About You Across The Pod

We discuss teen comedy 10 Things I Hate About You.

We mention it's themes, characters, music and why there's more than 10 things actually hated!

Find out what the next movie chat will be at the end.

#moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviesacrossthepod #podcasts #podcasting #10thingsihateaboutyou #movieschat

Ep13 Ready Player One.

We watch 2018's sci-fi nerdfest that is Ready Player One.

Davey loves the movie,it's soundtrack and the amount of easter eggs thrown in. We discuss our fave moments, scenes, characters and more. Plus...some facts and trivia too! Hope you enjoy. #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #podcasts #podcasting #readyplayerone

Ep12 : You Serious Clark? A Christmas Vacation chat

We chat about National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation.

We've both seen it so a chance for us to just discuss our fave moments and characters.

A few fun facts, Frank quizzes Dave with trivia questions and the next movie for them to discuss is issued.

Follow on the socials : Facebook Movies AcrossThePod, Twitter @acrosspod2022 and Instagram @acrossthepod2022

#moviesacrossthepodpodcast #moviesacrossthepod #movieschat #movies# nationallampoonschristmasvacation #christmasmovies #christmas

Ep11 : Santa Claus is comin' to town!

We watch the Rankin and Bass animated classic.. Santa Claus is comin' to town!

We discuss our favourite scenes, characters and find out what movies Davey was reminded of because of a tree! Get involved on Facebook at Movies AcrossThePod, Instagram @acrossthepod222 and Twitter @acrosspod2022

Ep10 : Last Action Hero A double-digit milestone! 10 episodes in and we watch the Arnold Schwarzenegger action comedy... Last Action Hero.

We chat about the iconic one-liners, cameos, movies it referenced and more. Apologies for the awful impressions we doðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. Rate and review wherever you listen. #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #lastactionhero #arnoldschwarzenegger #movieschat #podcasts

Ep9 : A load of Hocus Pocus In this spooky-inspired episode...we watched 1993 Disney movie Hocus Pocus.

As it's sequel is out...it seemed fitting to give this cult-classic a go. We discuss the plot, characters, what we took from it and more...including a reference to a certain preserve commercial. Also the usual facts, ratings and the next movie is pitched for Frank. #moviesacrossthepod #movieschat #podcasts #podcasting #hocuspocus #salemmass #polanerallfruit

Ep8 : A Clash of Opinions : Clash of The Titans chat.

We discuss 2010's Clash of The Titans starring Sam Worthington, Liam Neeson and Ralph Fienes.

We mention what movies it reminded Dave of, what we really thought of it and there's the usual facts. Get involved on Instagram @acrossthepod2022 and Twitter @acrosspod2022 #moviesacrossthepod #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #movieschat #clashofthetitans2010

Ep4 : Something has found us! Cloverfield chat.

We watch 2008 Found-footage Monster movie...Cloverfield.

We discuss some of the scenes, characters, opinions on the plot and what we enjoyed about it. Find out what's coming for episode 5. Get involved on Instagram @acrossthepod2022 or Twitter @acrosspod2022. Email at acrossthepod2022@gmail.com

Ep3: "Your Witness"

this time around is 1985's Witness, starring Harrison Ford, Kelly McGillis, Carl from Die Hard, and in an early role, Aragorn from Lord of the Rings! This film got Harrison Ford his only Academy Award nomination (so far!) and was Frank's first (approved) R-rated film as a kid.

We discuss key moments, characters, how the movie resonates today, bullies getting what they deserve from Ford, and McGillis's hypothetical bakery.

Follow us on Instagram @acrossthepod2022 or Twitter @acrosspod2022

Music courtesy of audionautix.com and josephmcdade.com

Ep2 : Big Trouble Across The Pod.

We go on a journey through the Iconic Cult Classic...Big Trouble in Little China.

We go through key scenes, characters, quotes and more. Find out if Frank enjoyed it? Also listen towards the end for the next movie to be discussed. #moviesacrossthepod #moviesacrossthepodpodcast #podcasts #podcasting #movies #80smovies #bigtroubleinlittlechina sEuCq5SXB3iKXBvwBlHU

Ep1 : The Breakfast Club. The start of a fun journey.

We watch The 80's Cult Classic...The Breakfast Club.

We chat about the characters, themes and more. There's a Scooby-Doo reference, Dave mentions UK show...Dad's Army and there's some facts about the movie too! Dave tells Frank what the next episode will be about. Follow us on Instagram @acrossthepod2022 or Twitter @acrosspod2022 Music courtesy of audionautix.com and josephmcdade.com

The Beginning: A new spin-off from Silver Screeners and DaveyATalks. We introduce ourselves and let you know what is to come with our joint venture as movie/tv fans. Get involved on Instagram @acrossthepod2022, on Twitter @acrosspod2022 or E-mail at acrossthepod2022@gmail.com. Music courtesy of Joseph McDade at www.josephmcdade.com #moviesacrossthepod #movies #tvshows #entertainmentchat #podcasts #podcasting I36ygmTp5jTmi8xsgxqD
